Message:
“Thank goodness...
I was able to protect you...
Grita...are you hurt anywhere...?”

“Lumica...!
Your wounds are so deep...
I said all those
horrible things to you,
so why did you
shield me like that?!”

“...! At this rate, you’ll...!
No... There is one way...”

“Let the light of this life
I cannot lose shine anew.

If thou desires the light
thou has given me
in exchange, then...”
Ahh... This light is so bright, I can’t see a...

Huh...? Where...?
Oh... Right...
I got injured, and then...

But, it doesn’t hurt.
Oh yeah, Grita—

I realized I was
in Grita’s arms.

Two white wings
sprouted from her back...
and a ring of light
floated above her head.
She looked just like...
